name: Helycon Inferno
description:
A firefighter is sent to a rundown facility after a distress message is found...

This is a small prototype of a firefighting game for Finally Finish Something Jam 2022.

This jam was super fun! Think ill put more work into this project, since I started 2 weeks late...

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • E: Interact
  • Left Mouse: Spray Water
  • Escape: Pause
  • Left Ctrl: Slide/Crouch
